mapper.select: select a.id, a.group_id as groupId, a.username , a.nickname , a.password , a.gmt_login as gmtLogin, a.gmt_modified as gmtModified , b.name as groupName from bi_user a join bi_group b on a.group_id = b.id order by a.group_id,a.id

select a.id as id, a.group_id as groupId, a.username as username, a.nickname as nickname, a.password as password, a.gmt_login as gmtLogin, a.gmt_modified as gmtModified , b.name as groupName from bi_user a join bi_group b on a.group_id = b.id where a.id=#{id}

select a.id as id, a.group_id as groupId, a.username as username, a.nickname as nickname, a.password as password, a.gmt_login as gmtLogin, a.gmt_modified as gmtModified , b.name as groupName from bi_user a join bi_group b on a.group_id = b.id where a.username=#{username}
mapper.insert: insert into bi_users ( group_id, staff_id, username, realname, password, gmt_create, gmt_modified ) values(#{groupId},#{staffId},#{username},#{password},now(),now());
mapper.update: update bi_users set group_id=#{groupId}, staff_id=#{staffId}, username=#{username}, realname=#{realname}, password=#{password}, gmt_modified=#{gmtModified}, gmt_login=#{gmtLogin} where id=#{id}
